replies.bodyText: can you please confirm the dependency kiegroup/kogito-runtimes has to be removed?
replies.author: Ginxo

replies.bodyText: No, I mean that kogito-examples don't depend on kogito-apps so we can remove that step entirely (and simplify the FDB)
replies.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: can you please confirm the dependency project: kiegroup/kogito-apps has to be removed? @danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
Yes I confirm, it is not included in existing PR check
https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-examples/blob/master/Jenkinsfile#L27-L31
replies.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: @danielezonca I will remove everything related to kogito-examples then...
replies.author: Ginxo

replies.bodyText: Sorry, it doesn't make sense (I mean what i proposed), probably we can spend some time after today's meeting to clarify the whole thing
replies.author: Ginxo

timeline.author: danielezonca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,34 @@
+version: "2.0"
+
+dependencies: ./project-dependencies.yaml
+
+build:
+  - project: kiegroup/kogito-runtimes
+    build-command:
+      upstream: |
+        mvn clean install -Dmaven.wagon.httpconnectionManager.ttlSeconds=25 -Dmaven.wagon.http.retryHandler.count=3
+      current: |
+        mvn clean install -Prun-code-coverage -Dmaven.wagon.httpconnectionManager.ttlSeconds=25 -Dmaven.wagon.http.retryHandler.count=3
+        mvn validate -Psonarcloud-analysis -e -nsu -Dmaven.wagon.httpconnectionManager.ttlSeconds=25 -Dmaven.wagon.http.retryHandler.count=3
+        mvn -f kogito-runtimes-integration-tests/pom.xml clean
+    clone:
+      - kogito-runtimes-integration-tests

replies.bodyText:
can you please confirm these are the lines to be removed @danielezonca
      mvn -f kogito-runtimes-integration-tests/pom.xml clean
    clone:
      - kogito-runtimes-integration-tests
replies.author: Ginxo

replies.bodyText: If I have understood correctly the way upstream work, this configuration should be enough to cover also runtime compilation, thus this entire block can be removed.
replies.author: danielezonca
